products.title: Stirlo Sloe Purple
products.metadescription: Made to measure stirlo sloe purple roller blind | privacy, dim-out fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Stirlo sloe purpleplain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on their professional discretion.

products.title: Splash Smokey Purple Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash smokey purple roller blind in purple. Made to measure from 9.35 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their best-selling splash range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish, the fabric offers wonderful light filtering properties in addition to this is also moisture resistant. This range of fabrics are the perfect choice for kitchens, bathrooms & en-suites. This dark smokey purple roller blind will brighten any room and offers wonderful light filtering properties meaning you can can achieve complete privacy without completely blocking light from coming into the room. This rich smokey purple fabric will look stunning paired with dark wooden tones, alternatively you could add a touch of opulence to the finish by pairing with luxurious emerald greens. Their rollers are great for privacy and light control.At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This purple roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by their blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.
 
 Product id: sdb-rbx2069 fabric colour: smokey purple material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: electric control battery powered energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Palate Mediterranean Purple Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Palate mediterranean purple roller blind
products.productdescription: The palate blackout roller blind range is a great option for bedrooms due to the blackout fabric blocking all light from passing through the fabric. With a range of colour to choose from in this range, you'll find a perfect match for your room.  Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Cordoba Blackout Purple Roller Blind
products.metadescription:
The deep purple tone here is one of warmth, its a stylish colour somewhere between dark blackcurrant and lighter grape, it has depth but isnt too vibrant or loud.    
This blackout roller blind will add a sophisticated note to a bedroom or maybe a cosy look in a bathroom.
